title: Jacket
description: blue and white batik continuous pattern on each long panel of open front with border patterns on sides and front; stand-up collar; top 2/3 of back have batik design with borders; bottom of back and bright blue sleeves have embroidered geometric designs in orange, red, black and white; cuffs on sleeves; completely lined in pink and white striped ticking
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
